text: Greel was a strange humanoid horror controlled by the Keldons during the Keldon Invasion of Jamuraa on Dominaria . Greel fed off the life force of others, which then caused him to rapidly grow, changing from a young boy to an adult in a matter of weeks. He served as a familiar for Erissa and Latulla to aid in their spellcasting. His origins are unknown. Greel is mainly noteworthy for killing Rayne . He was killed by Barrin , husband of Rayne, soon after. Associated cards: Depicted in:
